Your personal crypto wallet must be compatible with ERC20,
you can lose tokens…
changePassword.perex:
To update your password, first enter your current password
and then fill in the new one two times.
changePassword.weekPassword: The new password is too weak. Enter at least 8 characters.
changePassword.differentPassword: The entered passwords do not match.
authenticator.title: 2-Step Verification
authentication.perexStep1:
Turn on two-factor authentication to increase security
of your account.
authentication.perexStep2:
Turn on the Google Authenticator and scan this QR code. Enter the password
to the input field below. Click on the “Next” button to continue.
authentication.perexStep3:
Maximise your security. Use Google 2-step verification to protect
your account from potential attackers. Better be safe than sorry!
authentication.perexStepDisable:
Turning off two-step authentication (verification) process will significantly
decrease security of your account.
calc.tooltipFees: Our trading fees are going to be dynamic. We want to respond to competition and keep our fees among the lowest on the market.
